content: I recently got into the "my account" section of my profile here at MDC and discovered I had an old e-mail address for my address in the profile's settings. I changed the address to a current address and then forgot about it. This morning I got into that e-mail and discovered some unread e-mails from MDC members. They had been there unread for some time. I opened them and replied to those who wrote to me and probably thought I was ignoring them. Sometimes it pays to go into your account settings for your profile and check the settings to make sure your getting the messages being sent to you. If you sent an e-mail to that old address then, well... it's in the ether section of the internet and I doubt I'll ever see it. Sorry to anyone who may have felt slighted by my lack of attention to the details in my account section. Now, while your thinking about it, go into your profile and check your settings and update the stuff that might make a difference. Quantum materiae materietur marmota monax si marmota monax materiam possit materiari?

content: MDC just “purged” all of my e-mail and folders….lost everything going back since I joined… I’ve had slow e-mail also, and when I tried to send e-mail “out” to another box like “pop mail” it said it worked by doesn’t. The help desk was no help… Break glass…in case of Emergency! Or, just wait till I get to the bottom of the bottle!
